details.title: UWB Perimeter Surveillance
details.abstract: This program will develop an automated and unmanned ultra-wide band (UWB) perimeter surveillance sensor designed to provide detection and tracking of personnel and vehicles at the perimeter of critical areas such as military installations and other such facilities. This effort describes the work being done for the protection of high value assets using a compact system which incorporates two technologies to enhance the probability of detection in stressing environments
details.journal_title: IEEE Aerospace and Electronic Systems Magazine
